author: jpata
body:
- Calls a patched version of igprof (with 12_0_0_pre1 libigprof preloaded) for reco profiling on 11_3_0_pre5 and 11_3_0_pre6.
- Also saves JobReport.xml files for the profiles
- Tested in https://cmssdt.cern.ch/jenkins/job/release-run-reco-profiling/89, https://cmssdt.cern.ch/jenkins/job/release-run-reco-profiling/88 and more recent builds of https://cmssdt.cern.ch/jenkins/job/release-run-reco-profiling/
- nothing in the usual bot functionality should be affected
title: reco profiling fixes
